name: Chronicles of the Tainted World
entry: The Rise of the Usurper (RotU) and Path of the Vett'ghern (PoV) campaign is played out in Battle Brothers. The story centers on [character:8690587], an Abyssal Mage chosen by the chaos god, The [character:8690588], to hunt down [character:8690591], a rogue demon lord spreading a world-mutating "Chaos Plague." He is accompanied by [character:8690589], a Vatt'ghern tasked with morally policing him, as they navigate a conflict between the powers of chaos and death, culminating in a confrontation with the Usurper King in his dungeon. Essentially, it is a dark fantasy where the protagonists utilize tainted abyssal powers to stop a greater destructive force.
